mapper.select: /* [ToteReleaseMapper.xml] selectToteRelease */ SELECT TOTE_ID AS toteId, WAREHOUSE_KEY AS warehouseKey, 'RELEASE' AS releaseType, NVL(SUBSTR(RELEASE_CMPT_YMD,1,8), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AS releaseDate, NVL(SUBSTR(RELEASE_CMPT_YMD,9,6), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS')) AS releaseTime, RELEASE_CMPT_ID AS releaseUser, WIF_PICK_TOTE_HDR_SEQ AS toteUniqueNo, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS insertedDate, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS') AS insertedTime, CREATED_USER AS insertedUser FROM o_wcs.TB_WIF_PICK_TOTE_HDR WHERE RELEASE_CMPT_YN = 'Y' AND TOTE_RELEASE_INTF_YN = 'N' ORDER BY TOTE_ID ASC
